member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract
member.summary: Represents the base interface for all contracts that are used for communication between components that are updated independently.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.AcquireLifetimeToken
member.summary: Specifies that the contract is accessible to a client until the client revokes the contract.
member.returns: A value, also known as a lifetime token, that identifies the client that has acquired the contract.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.GetRemoteHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for the .
member.returns: A hash code for the .

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.QueryContract(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a contract that is implemented by this contract.
member.returns: An that represents a contract that a client is requesting from the current contract; null if the current contract does not support the contract that is requested.
member.param: A string that identifies the contract that is being requested.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.RemoteEquals(System.AddIn.Contract.IContract)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified contract is equal to this .
member.returns: true if is equal to this ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The contract to compare with this .

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.RemoteToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current .
member.returns: A string representation of the current .

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.RevokeLifetimeToken(System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies that the contract is no longer accessible to a client.
member.param: A value, also known as a lifetime token, that identifies the client that is revoking the contract.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IEnumeratorContract`1
member.summary: Enumerates the elements in an collection.
member.typeparam: The type of objects being enumerated.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IEnumeratorContract`1.GetCurrent
member.summary: Returns the object in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.
member.returns: The in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IEnumeratorContract`1.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.
member.returns: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
member.exception: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IEnumeratorContract`1.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.
member.exception: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract
member.summary: Defines an interface that host applications can implement to extend add-in executors.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.AssemblyLoaded(System.String)
member.summary: Called after an add-in executor loads an add-in assembly.
member.param: The name of the assembly that was loaded.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.AssemblyLoadedFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Called after an add-in executor loads an add-in assembly from a specified location.
member.param: The name of the assembly that was loaded.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.AssemblyLoading(System.String)
member.summary: Called just before an add-in executor loads an add-in assembly.
member.param: The name of the assembly to be loaded.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.AssemblyLoadingFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Called just before an add-in executor loads an add-in assembly from a specified location.
member.param: The name of the assembly to be loaded.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.EntryPointStarted(System.AddIn.Contract.IContract)
member.summary: Called after an add-in executor instantiates the entry point of an add-in assembly.
member.param: An that represents the entry point that was instantiated.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.EntryPointStarting(System.String,System.String,System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract)
member.summary: Called just before an add-in executor instantiates the entry point in an add-in assembly.
member.param: The name of the add-in assembly.
The name of the class that is the entry point for the add-in assembly.
An that contains the arguments that will be passed to the constructor for .

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IExecutorExtensionContract.ExecutorCreated
member.summary: Called after an add-in loader creates a new add-in executor.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1
member.summary: Represents a generic list of types that are defined by a contract and are used to pass collections of that contract type between a host and an add-in.
member.typeparam: The contract type of the objects in the list.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds an object to an collection.
member.param: The object to add.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.Clear
member.summary: Removes all objects from an collection.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.Contains(`0)
member.summary: Determines whether a specific item is in an collection.
member.returns: true if is in the collection; otherwise, false.
member.param: The object to look for in the collection.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of items in an collection.
member.returns: The number of items in the collection.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.GetEnumeratorContract
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through an collection.
member.returns: An enumerator to iterate through the collection.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.GetIsReadOnly
member.summary: Determines whether an collection is read-only.
member.returns: true if the collection is read-only; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.GetItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the item at the specified index of an collection.
member.returns: The item at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the item to get.
member.exception: is less than zero.-or- is equal to or greater than the return value of .

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.IndexOf(`0)
member.summary: Returns the index of a specific item in an collection.
member.returns: The index of the specified item.
member.param: An item in the collection.
member.exception: is less than zero.-or- is equal to or greater than the return value of the method.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.Insert(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Inserts an item at the specified index in an collection.
member.param: The zero-based index at which to insert .
The object to insert in the collection.
member.exception: is less than zero.-or- is equal to or greater than the return value of .
The collection is read-only.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes an item from an collection of a specified type.
member.returns: true if an item is removed; otherwise, false.
member.param: The item to remove from the collection.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the item at the specified index in an collection.
member.param: The index of the item to remove.
member.exception: is less than zero.-or- is equal to or greater than the return value of the method.
The collection is read-only.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1.SetItem(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Sets the item at the specified index in an collection.
member.param: The zero-based index at which to set the item.
The item to set at the specified index.
member.exception: is less than zero.-or- is equal to or greater than the return value of the method.
The collection is read-only.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract
member.summary: Provides access to a window's handle (Hwnd) from native code.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract.GetHandle
member.summary: Obtains the window's handle (Hwnd).
member.returns: An object that represents a pointer to the window's handle.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract
member.summary: Enables clients to provide custom services to components on which the contract is implemented.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.ProfferService(System.String,System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract)
member.summary: Adds a service to the set of services that can be accessed by clients of a component.
member.param: A string that identifies the service being offered.
An that implements the service being offered.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IProfferServiceContract.RevokeService(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a service from the set of services offered by a component.
member.param: A string that identifies the service being revoked.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract
member.summary: Defines a contract that provides information about a serializable object.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract.GetCanonicalName
member.summary: Returns the canonical name of the type of the object that this describes.
member.returns: The canonical name of the type of the object that this describes.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract.GetSerializableObjectData
member.summary: Returns data that can be used to help deserialize the object that this describes.
member.returns: A that contains data about the object that this describes.

member.name: T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract
member.summary: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service contract from a component.

member.name: M:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a service contract that is implemented by this .
member.returns: An that represents a service contract that a client is requesting from the ; null if the does not implement the requested contract.
member.param: The name of the service that is being requested.
The service contract that is being requested.
